definition: sth bad happened

to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]

to face legal action/to get sued

to be behind bars
accident

fatal/resulting in sb's death
to take a wrong turn/to go wrong
to settle privately/to solve behind closed doors/to settle out of court
to be punished/to be fined
